participant_1.background:
I am trying to keep myself fit and healthy.
I haven't worked at my current job for very long, because I just moved to Vienna.
I want to learn how to train my dog so that we can go on longer hikes together.
i have a rose tattooed on my right ankle.
I sell cosmetics in my spare time and help my sister Madonna with her beauty business.

participant_2.background:
A blue whale once swam past my boat.
I love romantic comedies, and they help me forget about my bad luck in relationships.
i enjoy jazz music.
I'm heading home after a long run to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos.
I love the feeling of the ocean water on my skin when I'm snorkeling.

content.text: Hello! I'm new in Vienna. Do you have any tips for me?
Hello! Welcome to Vienna! I'm sure you'll love it here. What are you interested in?
I'm interested in hiking, fitness, and beauty.
There are a lot of great hiking trails in the Vienna Woods. And there are also a lot of gyms and fitness studios. As for beauty, there are a lot of great salons and spas.
Thank you for the tips! I'm excited to explore Vienna.
You're welcome! I'm sure you'll have a great time here.
I'm also interested in learning how to train my dog so that we can go on longer hikes together.
There are a lot of great dog training schools in Vienna. I'm sure you can find one that fits your needs.
Thanks for the tip! I'll definitely look into it.
You're welcome! I'm sure you and your dog will have a lot of fun hiking together.
I'm sure we will! Thanks again for your help.
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.
